titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: <*> address = cross-out, hotel is real without extra markings s3: Duplicate of s1 s5: <*> note at bottom = "half"?

1938 DE MONTRICHER De Montricher - Mlle. C.
Hôtel de <*> Croix Blanche
Lodeve-Herault (By correspondance) 1 m 1v. 40f. owes 10% provinces charge 4v dep. 100f due 75
Apr. 20 Gods Little Acre July 25 " 20 Poems of D. Lewis July 25
Charge sub 3m 1 vol a 65v Paid 1m 2 vol b 40 due 25 deposit 100 owes 25 balance on dep. 75
